attributes.action: Fulfil Leave campaign's promise to spend £350 million per week on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
TV ads showed an imagined NHS hospital experience with Britain remaining in the EU versus a contrasting hospital experience with Britain outside the EU. This campaign was deliberately misleading to voters and there appears to be no intention of following through on this promise**. This government must now make good on this promise.
* http://www.voteleavetakecontrol.org/briefing_cost
** http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/24/nigel-farage-350-million-pledge-to-fund-the-nhs-was-a-mistake/
attributes.background: Leave campaigners claimed EU membership cost the UK £350 million per week and that this money should be better spent in Britain. There was a promise that this money would be spent on the NHS ("Our EU contributions are enough to build a new, fully-staffed NHS hospital every week"*).
